item.description:
2-4 pm at the Kowloon Restaurant on Rt 1 in Saugus. Cost is $15 and tickets must be purchased in advance. Food and drinks available to purchase.

Details for a meeting spot to follow


Please copy and paste the link below....and click on " see more". It tells you how to purchase tickets. Basically you need to give the names of the people attending and mail checks to:
ECBC
PO box 81
Reading MA 01867

http://www.facebook.c...

The ECBC will be selling tickets to the PREMIERE of BIKER CHICZ,
including a limited number of VIP tickets for a sneak preview of
episode one being held at Kowloon's, Rte 1 Saugus Sunday September 26th
2-4pm. Executive Producer Edward Winterhalder will be on hand also
showing 2 short biker films he produced of " Hog Heaven" and " Riding
on the Edge"

Biker Chicz is a reality television series that will feature the
colorful, entertaining and engaging women who are members of an
all-female motorcycle club in Boston known as the “East Coast Biker
Chicks” (ECBC). Set in the Boston metropolitan area, the series
chronicles the daily lives and activities of a group of empowered
women from all walks of life: a social worker, a scientist, a stock
broker, a wife and mother, a chiropractor and many others who are in
many ways average everyday typical American women. They are bound
together by their independence, love of motorcycles and the open road
and the camaraderie and fellowship which the ECBC provides.

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Biker Chicz Reality Show sneak preview party
